data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Pinar del Río, Cuba to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pinar del Río, Cuba
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Pinar del Río, Cuba a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Pinar del Río hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Pinar del Río, Cuba to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Viñales
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Viñales, Pinar del Río, Cuba.
Spirit, fill the 67,208 believers in the state of Pinar del Río with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Pinar del Río, Cuba into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Pinar del Río, Cuba to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

location.name: Pinar del Río
location.cities_list: Pinar del Río, Consolación del Sur, San Cristobal, Minas de Matahambre, Viñales
location.cities_list_w_pop: Pinar del Río (186,990), Consolación del Sur (69,857), San Cristobal (59,579), Minas de Matahambre (34,419), Viñales (27,129)
